movie.title: CSSA x WICS Movie Night: Turning Red
movie.description: Join us for a movie night! Vote for the movie you want to watch on our Discord server. Click on the title to learn more.

meeting.title: CSSA Winter 2024 General Meeting
meeting.description: Join us for our official Winter 2024 General Meeting where we will vote on changes to our constitution and discuss upcoming plans for the CSSA!

powerpoint.title: The Goosies
powerpoint.description: The "BEST" AWARD show, for the Computer Science community by the Computer Science community. Click on the title to learn more and to register.
